channel.title: Hamachi servers
channel.description: how do u make a hamachi server??

item.title: Hamachi servers
item.dc:creator: @indiankid indiankid
item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

[quote=".Steph, post:3, topic:67348"]First Download Hamachi, if you’ve done that… Good.
Then click on the Triangle > Create Server (Or something like that) > Enter the name > And the password…

Then advertise the Hamachi server and hope that your server will get crowded. Good Luck.[/quote][quote=“heavinlyevil, post:2, topic:67348”]To make a hamachi server is really simple just download hamachi and at the top u will see you ip a bunch of letter lyk 5.124.35.56 then u want to creat networks for your server then just run your server and your ip will be the ip at the top of your hamachi box[/quote]

nice to see juniors and members helping out

good job guys

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi servers
item.dc:creator: @laurens800 laurens800
item.description:
@laurens800 wrote:

delete hamachi > register at no-ip> make a redirect to your ip>open port 43594 tcp-udp>start server

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi servers
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

First Download Hamachi, if you’ve done that… Good.
Then click on the Triangle > Create Server (Or something like that) > Enter the name > And the password…

Then advertise the Hamachi server and hope that your server will get crowded. Good Luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Hamachi servers
item.dc:creator: @heavinlyevil heavinlyevil
item.description:
@heavinlyevil wrote:

To make a hamachi server is really simple just download hamachi and at the top u will see you ip a bunch of letter lyk 5.124.35.56 then u want to creat networks for your server then just run your server and your ip will be the ip at the top of your hamachi box
